content: As a follow up to our recent conversation with @Dave deBronkart - as we engage with the Patient community regarding FHIR accessible applications and devices, we would benefit this group with regard to FHIR Testing by looking for ways to provide similar to "Crash Test Results" in the automotive community if we find a way to publish"FHIR Conformance Results" from FHIR Implementers (vendors and organizations) so both App Implementers and Patients could review. Touchstone-AEGIS-WildFHIR-FHIR-Testing-Conformance-Test-results.jpg

Thanks, @Mario Hyland . For emphasis, may I suggest you rename this thread to "PublishING" vs published? And I'll put "conformance test" explicitly in the body here, to perhaps show up in future searches.
